summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS API Gateway Management API, providing in‑memory handling of WebSocket connections, including creation, retrieval, deletion, and message posting, and translating these actions into appropriate HTTP responses for testing purposes.
business_intent: Enable developers to develop and test applications that rely on the API Gateway Management API without accessing real AWS services, supporting local development, CI pipelines, and unit/integration testing of WebSocket‑based features.
